00037         PagingLandScapeListenerManager::~PagingLandScapeListenerManager(void)
00038         {
00039                 std::for_each(mTerrainReadyListeners.begin(), mTerrainReadyListeners.end(), delete_object());
00040 
00041                 std::for_each(mShowPageListeners.begin(), mShowPageListeners.end(), delete_object());
00042                 std::for_each(mHidePageListeners.begin(), mHidePageListeners.end(), delete_object());
00043                 std::for_each(mPreloadPageListeners.begin(), mPreloadPageListeners.end(), delete_object());
00044                 std::for_each(mLoadPageListeners.begin(), mLoadPageListeners.end(), delete_object());
00045                 std::for_each(mUnloadPageListeners.begin(), mUnloadPageListeners.end(), delete_object());
00046                 std::for_each(mPostunloadPageListeners.begin(), mPostunloadPageListeners.end(), delete_object());
00047                 std::for_each(mModifyPageListeners.begin(), mModifyPageListeners.end(), delete_object());
00048 
00049 
00050                 std::for_each(mShowTileListeners.begin(), mShowTileListeners.end(), delete_object());
00051                 std::for_each(mHideTileListeners.begin(), mHideTileListeners.end(), delete_object());
00052                 std::for_each(mLoadTileListeners.begin(), mLoadTileListeners.end(), delete_object());
00053                 std::for_each(mUnloadTileListeners.begin(), mUnloadTileListeners.end(), delete_object());
00054                 std::for_each(mModifyTileListeners.begin(), mModifyTileListeners.end(), delete_object());
00055 
00056         };
00057     //-------------------------------------------------------------------------
00058     void  PagingLandScapeListenerManager::firePagePreloaded(const size_t pagex, 
00059                                                                                                                         const size_t pagez, 
00060                                                                                                                         const Real* heightData, 
00061                                                                                                                         const AxisAlignedBox &Bbox)
00062         {
00063                 if (mPreloadPageListeners.empty())
00064                         return;
00065 
00066                 PagingLandscapeEvent e (pagex, pagez, 0, 0, heightData, Bbox);
00067                 for (std::list<PagingLandscapeDelegate *>::iterator it = mPreloadPageListeners.begin(); 
00068                         it != mPreloadPageListeners.end(); ++it)
00069                         (*(*it))(&e);
00070     }

00079                 for (std::list<PagingLandscapeDelegate *>::iterator it = mLoadPageListeners.begin(); 
00080                         it != mLoadPageListeners.end(); ++it)
00081                         (*(*it))(&e);
00082     }

00191     //-------------------------------------------------------------------------
00192     void PagingLandScapeListenerManager::fireTerrainReady()
00193     {
00194         if (mTerrainReadyListeners.empty())
00195             return;
00196 
00197                 PagingLandscapeEvent e (0, 0, 0, 0, 0, AxisAlignedBox ());
00198                 for (std::list<PagingLandscapeDelegate *>::iterator it = mTerrainReadyListeners.begin(); 
00199                                                                                 it != mTerrainReadyListeners.end(); ++it)
00200                                 (*(*it))(&e);
00201     }

00352         void PagingLandScapeListenerManager::addTerrainListener(PagingLandscapeDelegate* pl) 
00353         {
